TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.

span.span: Provides the underlying stream of data for network access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了用于通过发送和接收数据的方法处于阻止模式套接字。The class provides methods for sending and receiving data over sockets in blocking mode. 有关详细信息，有关阻止与非阻止性s，请参阅[使用异步客户端套接字](~/docs/framework/network-programming/using-an-asynchronous-client-socket.md)。For more information about blocking versus nonblocking s, see [Using an Asynchronous Client Socket](~/docs/framework/network-programming/using-an-asynchronous-client-socket.md). 可以使用的这两个同步和异步数据传输类。You can use the class for both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer. 有关同步和异步通信的详细信息，请参阅[套接字](~/docs/framework/network-programming/sockets.md)。For more information about synchronous and asynchronous communication, see [Sockets](~/docs/framework/network-programming/sockets.md). 若要创建，则必须提供连接。To create a , you must provide a connected . 此外可以指定哪些权限通过提供具有。You can also specify what permission the has over the provided . 默认情况下，关闭不会关闭所提供。By default, closing the does not close the provided . 如果你想能够关闭所提供的权限，则必须指定`true`的值的`ownsSocket`参数。If you want the to have permission to close the provided , you must specify `true` for the value of the `ownsSocket` parameter. 使用和方法用于简单的单线程同步阻塞 I/O。Use the and methods for simple single thread synchronous blocking I/O. 如果你想要处理 I/O 使用单独的线程，请考虑使用并方法，或和方法进行通信。If you want to process your I/O using separate threads, consider using the and methods, or the and methods for communication. 不支持对网络数据流的随机访问。The does not support random access to the network data stream. 值属性，用于指示流是否支持查找，始终是`false`; 读取属性，读取属性或调用方法将引发.The value of the property, which indicates whether the stream supports seeking, is always `false`; reading the property, reading the property, or calling the method will throw a . 读取和写入操作可以同时执行的实例上类，而无需同步。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要没有个写入操作的一个唯一线程和读取操作的一个唯一的线程，读取之间将存在交叉引用和写线程并没有进行的同步不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建从连接并执行基本的同步阻塞 I/O。The following code example demonstrates how to create a from a connected and perform basic synchronous blocking I/O. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始以异步方式从传入的网络缓冲区中读取数据。The method starts asynchronously reading data from the incoming network buffers. 调用方法使您能够收到单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 必须创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 至少，你`state`参数必须包含。At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the . 由于想要获取在回调方法中接收到的数据，应创建较小的类或结构，用于保存读取的缓冲区和任何其他有用信息。Because you will want to obtain the received data within your callback method, you should create a small class or structure to hold a read buffer and any other useful information. 传递到该结构或类实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass the structure or class instance to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should call the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将等待，直到收到数据或发生错误，并且然后系统将使用单独的线程中执行指定的回调方法和对阻止直到所提供读取数据或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will wait until data is received or an error occurs, and then the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the provided reads data or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 调用在回调方法时所需的原始线程继续执行。Call in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 方法读取数量是可用，直到达到指定的字节数的数据`size`参数。The method reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是这样，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. 读取和写入操作可以同时执行的实例上类，而无需同步。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要没有个写入操作的一个唯一线程和读取操作的一个唯一的线程，读取之间将存在交叉引用和写线程并没有进行的同步不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用从网络流以异步方式读取数据。The following code example uses to read data asynchronously from the network stream. `myReadCallBack`方法实现委派并由系统调用时返回。The `myReadCallBack` method implements the delegate and is called by the system when returns. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从开始到远程主机异步发送操作。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host. 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 必须创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 至少，你`state`参数必须包含。At the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the . 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建较小的类或结构，用于保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 传递到该结构或类实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass the structure or class instance to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应实现方法。Your callback method should implement the method. 当应用程序调用，系统使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止上直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 调用在回调方法时所需的原始线程继续执行。Call in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是这样，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. 读取和写入操作可以同时执行的实例上类，而无需同步。Read and write operations can be performed simultaneously on an instance of the class without the need for synchronization. 只要没有个写入操作的一个唯一线程和读取操作的一个唯一的线程，读取之间将存在交叉引用和写线程并没有进行的同步不需要。As long as there is one unique thread for the write operations and one unique thread for the read operations, there will be no cross-interference between read and write threads and no synchronization is required. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将以异步方式将数据写入到网络流。The following code example uses to write data asynchronously to a network stream. `myWriteCallBack`方法实现委派并由系统调用时返回。The `myWriteCallBack` method implements the delegate and is called by the system when returns. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，允许调用方法。If is `true`, allows calls to the method. 提供相应枚举值，在构造函数中设置的可读性和可写性的。Provide the appropriate enumerated value in the constructor to set the readability and writability of the . 时设置属性初始化。The property is set when the is initialized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查以便确认是可读。The following code example checks to verify that the is readable. 然后执行读取的操作上。It then performs a read operation on the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

returns.span: The number of bytes read from the .

span.span: The number of bytes read from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成异步读取的操作以启动方法。The method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the method. 然后再调用，你需要创建实现一个回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 该回调方法在一个单独的线程中执行，并由系统后调用返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回调方法必须接受从返回方法作为参数。The callback method must accept the returned from the method as a parameter. 在回调方法中，调用的属性若要获取状态对象传递给方法。Within the callback method, call the property of the to obtain the state object passed to the method. 提取接收从该状态对象。Extract the receiving from this state object. 获取后，调用方法成功完成读取的操作，并返回读取的字节数。After obtaining the , call the method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read. 方法进行阻止，直到有可用数据。The method blocks until data is available. 方法读取的数据，可在指定的字节数目可高达`size`参数的方法。The method reads as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified in the `size` parameter of the method. 如果远程主机关闭收到了连接和可用的所有数据，方法将立即完成并返回零字节。If the remote host shuts down the connection and all available data has been received, the method completes immediately and returns zero bytes. 若要获取所接收的数据，请调用属性的，然后提取生成的状态对象中包含的缓冲区。To obtain the received data, call the property of the , and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是这样，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，`myReadCallback`提供给作为回调方法。In the following code example, `myReadCallback` is provided to as the callback method. 在中实现`myReadCallback`若要完成的异步读取调用由启动。 is implemented in `myReadCallback` to complete the asynchronous read call started by . [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#5)]

The underlying is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成异步发送操作中启动。 completes the asynchronous send operation started in . 然后再调用，你需要创建实现一个回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 该回调方法在一个单独的线程中执行，并由系统后调用返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回调方法必须接受从返回方法作为参数。The callback method must accept the returned from the method as a parameter. 在回调方法中，调用的属性`IAsyncResult`参数来获取。Within the callback method, call the property of the `IAsyncResult` parameter to obtain the . 获取后，可以调用方法成功完成发送操作并返回发送的字节数。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent. 方法进行阻止，直到发送请求的字节数。The method blocks until the requested number of bytes are sent. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是这样，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，`myWriteCallback`提供给作为回调方法。In the following code example, `myWriteCallback` is provided to as the callback method. 在中实现`myWriteCallback`以完成由启动异步写入调用。 is implemented in `myWriteCallback` to complete the asynchronous write call started by . [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Async_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关使用 Finalize 方法的详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).For more information about using the Finalize method, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将数据读入`buffer`参数，并返回已成功读取的字节数。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read. 如果已关闭套接字，方法返回 0。If the socket is closed, the method returns 0. 操作读取的数据是可用，直到达到指定的字节数`size`参数。The operation reads as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 如果远程主机关闭了连接，并已接收所有可用的数据，方法立即完成并返回零字节。If the remote host shuts down the connection, and all available data has been received, the method completes immediately and return zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 检查是否通过调用是可读属性。Check to see if the is readable by calling the property. 如果你尝试从读取不可读，你将收到。If you attempt to read from a that is not readable, you will get an . > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . 如果是这样，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If so, use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以确定数据是否可供读取。The following code example uses to determine if data is available to be read. 如果数据不可用，它将读取从。If data is available, it reads from the . [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a read operation blocks waiting for data.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a read operation blocks waiting for data.

value.span: 一个，指定以毫秒为单位，读取的操作失败前经过的时间。

span.span: A that specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that will elapse before a read operation fails.

value.span: 默认值为，指定读取的操作不会超时。

span.span: The default value, , specifies that the read operation does not time out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性指定的时间内未完成读取的操作，读取的操作将引发。If the read operation does not complete within the time specified by this property, the read operation throws an . > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅影响通过调用来执行方法。This property affects only synchronous reads performed by calling the method. 此属性不会影响通过调用所执行的异步读取方法。This property does not affect asynchronous reads performed by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个网络流的读取超时值设置为 10 毫秒。The following code example sets the read time-out for a network stream to 10 milliseconds. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始指定`offset`，并将发送`size`中的内容的字节`buffer`到网络。The method starts at the specified `offset` and sends `size` bytes from the contents of `buffer` to the network. 方法进行阻止，直到发送请求的字节数或引发。The method blocks until the requested number of bytes is sent or a is thrown. 如果你收到，使用属性获取特定错误代码，并以 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明，请参阅。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code, and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 检查是否是可写访问属性。Check to see if the is writable by accessing the property. 如果尝试写入不是可写，你将收到。If you attempt to write to a that is not writable, you will get an . 如果你收到，检查属性来确定它导致通过。If you receive an , check the property to determine if it was caused by a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查以查看是否是可写。The following code example checks to see whether the is writable. 如果是，然后用于编写一个小的消息。If it is, then is used to write a small message. [!code-cpp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkStream_Synch_SendAndReceive/VB/source.vb#3)]
